title: How to share .webm highlights?
body: How do I share .webm highlights on the boards considering that it is a locally stored file (e.g., /Users/User/Documents/..)?

replies.body: The extension sounds a bit strange, but it's actually pretty versatile.  You can share it with anyone, and per the [replays ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)guide, they can just drag it into Chrome or Firefox to play it.  Let me know if that helps.
I did a google search and webmshare.com seems to be the best. It's like imgur, but for .webm files. :)
Is it possible to make .webm shared videos (hosted on webmshare) on threads (main post) be played within the thread similar to twitch.tv clips?
